lead_paragraph: KRAMER--Sarah Greenberg, passed away at home peacefully after a long and meaningful life at the age of 96 surrounded by her family. She leaves her three loving children, Noelle Parket, Marilyn Kramer Weitzman (Kahn) and Glenn Kramer and their respective spouses, Robert Parket, Thomas Graham Kahn and Lynn Wechsler Kramer. She leaves seven devoted grandchildren and their spouses, ten loving great-grandchildren and many caring relatives and friends. Her beloved husband, Philip Kramer, former President and CEO of Hess Corporation predeceased her. Sarah was a beautiful, independent woman who moved from humble beginnings to a luxury New York City building and still maintained her modest demeanor. She frequented the ballet, theater and museums, but was always available for family and her most beloved spouse. Within the last few months, she continued to lead an active life. A funeral service will be held at Riverside Memorial Chapel, 180 West 76th Street at Amsterdam Avenue, on Monday, May 23 at 11:15am. The family will be sitting Shiva on Monday, May 23 and Tuesday, May 24 from 4:30pm-8:00pm at the home of Marilyn Weitzman Kahn, 25 Central Park West and on Wednesday, May 25 and Thursday, May 26 from 3:00pm-5:00pm and 7:00pm-9:00pm at the home of Noelle Parket. Anyone wishing to celebrate Sarah's life may contribute to CaringKind - The Heart of Alzheimer's Caregiving, Attention: Lou-Ellen Barkan, 360 Lexington Ave., 4th floor, NY, NY 10017. 1/3
